About

Red River Equity is a private investment firm located in Dallas, Texas. Red River’s team has successfully invested and/or advised over 35 middle market companies spanning a diverse array of industries.

Red River Equity assists management teams to build sustainable value in companies with a focused strategy in acquiring controlling positions in select, growing, middle market companies. The goal is to align incentives, motivate management, implement new corporate strategies, and mitigate downside risk.

Investment Criteria
We look for experienced management teams seeking a capital partner with the same drive, ethics and desire to build a better and stronger company. These partnerships with management, Red River’s depth of experience, and our proven ability to unlock the full potential of companies allows success stories to be created.

 

TARGET CRITERIA:
Asset-light or low working capital
Founder-owned, entrepreneurial, growth oriented businesses
Key managers and/or founder(s) desiring to retain an equity stake and remain with the business in a transitional or long-term role
TRANSACTION TYPES:
Majority re-capitalization
Management / partnership buyout
COMPANY SIZE:
Revenue from $10m to $100m
EBITDA up to $15m
INDUSTRY FOCUS:
Business services
Inspection, repair, maintenance
Testing / measurement
Energy
Upstream
Downstream
Midstream
Oilfield Services
Light manufacturing and assembly
Short-run, quick turn-around, high volume
Technology
Technology-enabled services
Software as a service

Partner with Red River Equity

Red River Equity is actively seeking new investment opportunities and we welcome inquiries and investment proposals from owners, advisors, and intermediaries representing companies seeking an equity partner.  If you have a business or division of a company that fits our acquisition profile, we’d like to hear from you.

In addition, we work with intermediaries and pay referral fees upon the consummation of a transaction.

To discuss a new opportunity or learn more about Red River Equity please contact Matt Karcher at 469.667.8046 or matt@redriverequity.com.
